description: Echoes through spires and cobblestones: a playlist for wandering Zurich's sacred, storied churches.

items.name: Grossmünster Church
items.opening_hours_text: March to October – (Mon-Sat) 10:00 AM to 06:00 PM; (Sun) After service

items.name: St. Peter Church
items.opening_hours_text: 08:00 AM to 06:00 PM (Weekdays); 10:00 AM to 04:00 PM (Sat); 11:00 AM to 05:00 PM (Sun)

items.name: St. Josef Church
items.opening_hours_text: 09:00 AM to 04:00 PM (Weekdays); Closed on Weekends

items.name: Wasserkirche
items.opening_hours_text: 12:00 PM to 03:00 PM (Wed- Fri); 12:00 PM to 05:00 PM (Sat, Sun); Closed (Mon,Tue)

items.name: Fraumünster Church
items.description: With an elaborate history of inhabiting the female members of aristocracy and also known by the name of ‘Church of our lady', the Fraumünster Church in Zurich displays a spectacular site from inside. Be prepared to admire the stunning craftwork of 5 part cycle in the chancel and southern transept. The cloister exhibits a chain of frescos done by Paul Bodmer.
items.opening_hours_text: 10:00 AM to 05:00 PM (Nov-Feb); 10:00 AM to 06:00 PM (Mar-Oct)

items.name: Liebfrauen Church
items.opening_hours_text: 09:00 AM to 12:00 PM and 02:00 PM to 05:00 PM (Mon-Fri)

items.name: Kirche Enge
items.opening_hours_text: 09:00 AM to 09:00 PM (Mon-Fri); 12:00 PM to 09:00 PM

items.name: Predigerkirche
items.opening_hours_text: 10:00 AM to 06:00 PM everyday except Mondays and Sundays; 12:00 PM to 06:00 PM (Mon) and 12:00 PM to 05:00 PM (Sun)
